comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: >>"E. Youngstown -- Vigilantes under Oscar Diser, City Solicitor" This is captioned on the Bain negative, as "Lord Derby" ... It does appear to be Lord Derby (1865–1948), 17th Earl of Derby, also known as Edward George Villiers Stanley, also known as Lord Stanley, as shown in these other Bain/LOC photographs on Flickr:             "Lord Derby c.1910" (LOC)             "Lord Derby Inspecting Dockers' Battalion" (LOC)   There is an image titled "Vigilantes under Oscar Diser, city solicitor, E. Youngstown" in the Bain/LOC Collection that has not yet been uploaded to Flickr. There appears to be another (duplicate?) image of "Vigilantes under Oscar Diser ..." that does appear on Flickr here which is incorrectly titled "Lord Derby". Both incorrectly titled images have consecutive call numbers ;)

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for sorting it out!  We'll fix the records.
